channel.title: CVE Feed for halo-dev -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for halo-dev -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-22124|2024-08-03T03:07:49.050Z -- halo-dev -- halo
item.description: In Halo, versions v1.0.0 to v1.4.17 (latest) are vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) in the profile image. An authenticated attacker can upload a carefully crafted SVG file that will trigger arbitrary javascript to run on a victim’s browser.

item.title: CVE-2022-22123|2024-08-03T03:07:48.293Z -- halo-dev -- halo
item.description: In Halo, versions v1.0.0 to v1.4.17 (latest) are vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) in the article title. An authenticated attacker can inject arbitrary javascript code that will execute on a victim’s server.

item.title: CVE-2022-22125|2024-08-03T03:07:48.275Z -- halo-dev -- halo
item.description: In Halo, versions v1.0.0 to v1.4.17 (latest) are vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) in the article tag. An authenticated admin attacker can inject arbitrary javascript code that will execute on a victim’s server.
